mapper.select: select * from ( select A.E_name, B.write_date, B.ranking, B.comments, B.userid from restaurant A, review B where A.RESTAURANT_NUMBER = B.RESTAURANT_NUMBER ) V where V.userid = #{userid} order by write_Date desc

mapper.delete: delete from review where userid = #{userid} and comments = #{comments} and write_date = #{write_date}
